description: Custom exceptions for gcloud package. See: https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/json_api/v1/status-codes

params.description: The body of the HTTP error response.
params.name: content

params.description: Flag indicating if content is expected to be JSON.
params.name: use_json

params.description: A response object that defines a status code as the status attribute.
params.name: response
types: httplib2.Response or other HTTP response object

params.description: Optional string giving extra information about the failed request.
params.name: error_info

types: instance of GCloudError, or a concrete sub.

name: Exceptions
